description: A pair of cardboard-framed glasses with UV and IR-filtered lenses topped with a layer of aluminum coating.  They allow safe viewing of extremely bright and harmful sources of light, like the sun during a solar eclipse.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
A pair of stylish sunglasses.  Look good while keeping the glare out of your eyes.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
A pair of fit-over sunglasses designed to be worn over a pair of corrective glasses.  Good for keeping the glare out of your eyes.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
Modern tactical eyewear that protects from small projectiles and fragments.  Provides excellent protection from environmental dangers.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
A pair of bifocal glasses for those who are both near-sighted and far-sighted.  You can use them to focus sunlight.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
A pair of glasses for the near-sighted.  The concave lenses diffuse the sunlight, rendering them useless for starting fires.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation

An essential article of the gentleman's apparel.  Also corrects near-sightedness.  The concave lenses diffuse the sunlight, rendering them useless for starting fires.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
A pair of glasses for the far-sighted.  Useless for anyone else.  You can use them to focus sunlight.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
A pair of plastic glasses, used in workshops, sports, chemistry labs, and many other places.  Provides great protection from damage.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
A large pair of goggles that completely seal off your eyes.  Provides excellent protection from environmental dangers.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
A dark pair of goggles.  They make seeing very difficult, but protect you from bright flashes.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation

Eyewear carved from wood or bone, with only a thin slit to see out of.  Helps reduce glare, traditionally used by the Inuit to protect against snow blindness.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
A pair of sunglasses, good for keeping the glare out of your eyes.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
